name: StinkyPinky
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: stinky pinky
des:
Stinky Pinky is the brilliant game with the silly name!

A Stinky Pinky, is just the answer to a question. 
But for that answer to be a Stinky Pinky, it must consist of 2 rhyming words.

For example, the stinky pinky for the clue: “a chubby kitty”, would be: “Fat Cat”.

I'll give you 30 seconds to guess each stinky pinky. 
But if you know the answer before then, you can interrupt the countdown by saying “Alexa”, then stating your answer.

You need 3 correct answers in a row, to win a single player game.

You can also have multi-player games of up to 6 players.

If you want to reset the number of players, just say “Alexa, start new game”.

Feedback
-------------
I hope you’ll love Stinky Pinky. If you have any issues, please let me know on the Stinky Pinky Facebook page, or by e-mail at animal.letters@gmail.com

More games? 
------------------
Why not try:
“Alexa open THE Daily Question”
“Alexa open the Daily Connection”
“Alexa open Feel the Pressure”
“Alexa open Animal Letters”
“Alexa open Name Letters”
“Alexa open Yes Majesty”
"Alexa open Scary Monster"
"Alexa open Space Express"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
